grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 芳香【ホウコウ】perfume, fragrance, aroma, balm, sweet scent
芳韻【ホウイン】Chinese poem, poem, rhyme
遺芳【イホウ】memory or autograph of deceased
余芳【ヨホウ】lingering fragrance, continuing fame (after death)
kun reading compounds: 芳しい【かんばしい】sweet, fragrant, aromatic, good (e.g. reputation, rumor), favorable
